title: Burger & Frights
description: A short PS1-style horror game delivering a nostalgic and creepy experience. Work a late-night shift at a fast-food restaurant where things quickly take a terrifying turn. Features intentionally low-poly graphics and tank controls reminiscent of classic PlayStation horror games.
how_to_play: Use WASD or arrow keys to move your character. Space to interact with objects. Shift to run when available. Navigate the increasingly disturbing fast-food restaurant, solve puzzles, and try to survive your shift as the night becomes progressively more horrifying.
